mapper.select: SELECT A.REVIEW_CONT, A.REVIEW_DATE, A.REVIEW_STAR, A.REVIEW_ID, B.USER_ID, B.LES_ID, C.USER_NM, c.USER_PROFILE FROM REVIEW A, PAY B, USERS C WHERE a.pay_id=b.pay_id and b.lES_ID=#{lesId} and b.user_id=c.user_id order by review_date desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(REVIEW_ID,REVIEW_CONT,REVIEW_STAR,REVIEW_DATE,PAY_ID) VALUES('REVIEW'||LPAD(REVIEW_SEQ.nextval,4,'0'), #{reviewCont}, #{reviewStar}, SYSDATE, (SELECT PAY_ID FROM pay WHERE user_id=#{userId} and les_id=#{lesId}))
mapper.select: SELECT round(avg(review_star),1) from review A, pay B where a.pay_id=b.pay_id and b.lES_ID=#{lesId}

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN review_star=5 THEN 1 END) AS five, COUNT(CASE WHEN review_star=4 THEN 1 END) AS four, COUNT(CASE WHEN review_star=3 THEN 1 END) AS three, COUNT(CASE WHEN review_star=2 THEN 1 END) AS two, COUNT(CASE WHEN review_star=1 THEN 1 END) AS one FROM review A, pay B where a.pay_id=b.pay_id and b.lES_ID=#{lesId}
SELECT PAY_ID FROM pay WHERE user_id=#{userId} and les_id=#{lesId}
